short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will shine up moodle for students at Aalborg University!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make over for AAU moodle, gives a better experience for students at Aalborg University.
Disclaimer: This is a early version, feel free to come up with suggestions for improvements.
